description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon With Radishes & A Spiced Yoghurt Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Smoked Salmon With Radishes & A Spiced Yoghurt Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs capers, rinsed, gently squeezed dry, and chopped
1 fresh red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
250g smoked salmon, chopped into bitesized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together the tomatoes, capers, radish, capsicum, spring onions, and chilli. Tip over the orange and lime juice, and season with salt and black pepper. Toss together, and leave to stand for about 10 minutes, to allow the flavours to develop.
To make the spiced yoghurt dressing, mix together the yoghurt, lemon juice, and fivespice powder in a small bowl. Season to taste.
When ready to serve, add the smoked salmon pieces to the salad mixture, and stir through well. Serve with the yoghurt dip on the side.
